title: Lp killer- Bugs
body: I was in load screen and I can hear all the background music the "welcome to summoners rift" voice and i wasn't in the game yet just in blank load screen. I tried restarting the game 2 times then i got fed up and had to restart my whole laptop just to get in game. Needless to say i was out for 10 mins and already lost tower on my lane; we lost(also i was playing with a rito employee). Side note since im here, I also get a bug where my hub, minimap, score/time/cs screen is gone(from earlier games). It was completely blank asides from my char and the backgrounds and i had to restart the game to get it back... any help?

replies.body: It sounds like you've connected to the game but a driver issue or something else failed to render the game.  Run through each step of our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune things up, but test it in a custom game so you don't face any penalties.
